author: guitargeek
body:
Besides adding the Ele MVA V2 weight files here, I gzipped all Run 2 weight files, as advised in the previous PR:

https://github.com/cms-data/RecoEgamma-ElectronIdentification/pull/8.

We are preparing a PR in egamma which makes CMSSW automatically detect if the weight files are gzipped or not. This PR should be synchronized with that one.
title: Added Ele MVA V2 weight files and gzipped all Run 2 weight files
